Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Scott Hoag to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Scott Hoag, a city of Rome police officer, to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Scott Hoag to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
